item.title: Andi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Let no man pull you so low as to hate him." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "I know God won't give me anything I can't handle. I just wish he didn't trust me so much." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "God doesn't require us to succeed, he only requires that you try." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Live simply so others may simply live." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "I can do things you cannot, you can do things I cannot; together we can do great things." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "A life not lived for others is not a life." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you can't feed a hundred people, feed just one." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Andi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Andi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Faith is taking the first step even when you can't see the whole staircase." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Andi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Andi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "I have decided to stick to love...Hate is too great a burden to bear." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Andi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "No person has the right to rain on your dreams." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Andi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "There is no gain without struggle." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Andi add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "There is no dishonor in losing the race. There is only dishonor in not racing because you are afraid to lose." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Andi add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "So much of language is unspoken. So much of language is compromised of looks and gestures and sounds that are not words. People are ignorant of the vast complexity of their own communication." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Andi add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "The human language, as precise as it is with its thousands of words, can still be so wonderfully vague." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Andi add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "[T]he race is long - to finish first, first you must finish." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Andi add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "To live every day as if it had been stolen from death, that is how I would like to live." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Andi add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "There must be something in books, something we can’t imagine, to make a woman stay in a burning house; there must be something there. You don’t stay for nothing." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Andi add a quote by Heinrich Heine
item.description: "Where they have burned books, they will end in burning human beings." -- Heinrich Heine

item.title: Andi add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "There is more than one way to burn a book. And the world is full of people running about with lit matches." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Andi add a quote by Richard Peck
item.description: "Only the nonreader fears books. " -- Richard Peck

item.title: Andi add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "There's zero correlation between being the best talker and having the best ideas." -- Susan Cain
